mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_BIRTH, MEMBER_PNUM) VALUES ( #{ member_no}, #{ member_name}, #{ member_id}, #{ member_pw}, #{ member_birth}, #{ member_pnum} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID=#{ member_id}
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_ID) AS RESULT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{member_id}
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS RESULT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_PNUM = #{member_pnum}
SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{member_no}
